name: (Mobile) Claudio´s Run
description: Claudio´s Run is a infinity runner game for mobile, where you run, collect coins, gems and run the fartest you can and reach the highest score at the game leaderboard´s  and show to your friends and the other players. Use your coins and gems to  buy power ups to help yourself reaching better distances, and costumize your own character´s skins. Enjoy :)
